ja264:0.1_0: The group of twelve on “as expected”
ja264:0.4_0: The Longer Discourse on the message.
ja264:1.1_0: There was a king named Panāda
ja264:1.2_0: who had a sacrificial post all golden.
ja264:1.3_0: Its height was sixteen times its width,
ja264:2.1_0: It had a thousand panels and a hundred ball-caps,
ja264:2.2_0: all adorned with banners, and made of gold.
ja264:3.4_0: you provide services for a man.”
ja264:4.1_0: A great class of rebirth is found.
